subject: Doping (Sports)
Automobile Racing
Tests and Testing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: DOVER, Del (AP) — Nascar has toughened its drug policy and will perform random tests in the three national series in 2009, on everyone from star drivers to virtually anonymous tire changers.
snippet: DOVER, Del (AP) — Nascar has toughened its drug policy and will perform random tests in the three national series in 2009, on everyone from star drivers to virtually anonymous tire changers.
